relocation-in-turkey.title: Relocation & support
relocation-in-turkey.subtitle: Full on-the-ground support: we meet you, help with visa, residence permit and adaptation.

services.documents: Consultation on collecting necessary documents for admission
services.translation: Assistance with translation and notarization of documents
services.guarantee: Guarantee of university admission for the student

additionalServices.residencePermit: Preparation and collection of all necessary documents for Residence Permit
additionalServices.denklik: Consultation and processing of Denklik belgesi
additionalServices.simCard: Assistance with purchasing a SIM card

additionalServices.apartment: Apartment search and assistance with notarized rental agreement

benefits.title: Why Choose Us?
benefits.content: We provide modern, trustworthy service. Unlike agencies that rush through processes, we handle everything properly with official documentation and transparent communication. Every step is tracked and you're always informed.

risks.title: Common Mistakes to Avoid
risks.content: Many students arrive unprepared and face fines for missed residence permit deadlines, rejected applications due to incorrect documents, or housing contract issues. Edu Turkish has been helping students navigate Turkish bureaucracy since 2018 with zero rejected applications.

process_time.question: How long does the entire settlement process take?
process_time.answer: The full process typically takes 30-45 days from arrival to residence permit submission. We provide a detailed timeline after you submit your documents.

installments.question: Can I pay in installments?
installments.answer: Yes, we offer payment plans. Standard package can be split into 2 payments, VIP into 3 payments. Contact us for specific terms.

cities.question: Do you work in all Turkish cities?
cities.answer: We operate in Istanbul, Ankara, Izmir, Antalya, and Bursa. For other cities, we can provide remote consultation and document preparation.

individual_services.question: Can I order individual services instead of a full package?
individual_services.answer: Yes, individual services are available. However, packages offer better value (15-20% discount) and ensure nothing is missed in the settlement process.

risks.question: What are the risks of doing everything myself?
risks.answer: Common issues include: incorrect document translations rejected by authorities, missed residence permit deadlines resulting in fines (500-1000 TRY), unfavorable rental contracts, and difficulty opening bank accounts without proper guidance.

accommodation.question: Is accommodation included in the package price?
accommodation.answer: No, the package covers search assistance and contract review. You pay rent directly to the landlord. We help you find options within your budget and negotiate fair terms.

documents.question: What documents do I need to prepare before arrival?
documents.answer: Required: passport (valid 6+ months), university acceptance letter, diploma and transcript, health insurance certificate, and 4 passport photos. We provide a complete checklist with instructions after booking.

visa.question: Do you help with visa applications?
visa.answer: Standard package includes enrollment documentation for student visa. VIP package includes full visa application support with consulate appointment booking and interview preparation.

rejection.question: What happens if my residence permit is rejected?
rejection.answer: In 6 years, we've had zero rejections when clients follow our guidance. If a rejection occurs due to our error, we resubmit at no cost and cover any related fines or legal fees.

tr-yos-courses.title: TR-YÖS preparation
tr-yos-courses.subtitle: Our expert courses and proven methods help you achieve a high score.

basic.name: Basic
basic.description:
Duration: 7+ months
Group: up to 10 people
Program: full preparation on all topics
Schedule: 3 lessons per week

individual.name: Individual
individual.description:
Duration: 7+ months
Format: individual lessons
Program: same base + adaptation to your level
Schedule: 3 lessons per week

courseGoal.title: Course Goal
courseGoal.description: We prepare for TR-YÖS to achieve the highest possible score sufficient for admission to your chosen faculty — including the most competitive programs. Every student receives an equally strong curriculum, and the result depends on their preparation level and chosen learning format.

theory.title: Theory
theory.description: Fundamentals of mathematics, logic, and geometry

practice.title: Practice
practice.description: Many problems solved during theory sessions with detailed explanations

formatSchedule.title: Format
formatSchedule.recordings: Lesson recordings available to our students

difference.question: What's the difference between 'Basic' and 'Individual' packages?
difference.answer: The curriculum is the same for everyone and aims for a high TR-YÖS score. The difference lies in the group size and level of instructor attention. 'Basic' has up to 10 people, while 'Individual' format involves personal lessons.

trial.question: Are trial lessons available?
trial.answer: Yes, if desired, you can attend a trial lesson and familiarize yourself with the instructor's approach.

content.question: What's included in the program?
content.answer: Full TR-YÖS preparation course: mathematics, logic, geometry, problem solving, exam strategy, practice tests, etc.

missed_lesson.question: What if I miss a lesson?
missed_lesson.answer: In groups, lesson recordings are provided. In individual format, it's possible to reschedule the lesson.

score.question: How many points can I realistically score after the course?
score.answer: Everything depends on the student's level and effort. The program is designed for preparation to 350+ points with regular participation and homework completion!

online.question: Is the learning format online or offline?
online.answer: The training is conducted online, with live lessons and constant feedback.

sat-courses.title: SAT preparation
sat-courses.subtitle: We train at the level of top international schools, opening doors to leading universities.

turkish-english-course.title: Language courses (TR/EN)
turkish-english-course.subtitle: Speak with confidence! We help you pass TÖMER/IELTS and feel at home in Turkey.

document-translations.title: Translation & legalization
document-translations.subtitle: 100% guarantee: your documents will be translated, certified (yeminli tercüman) and accepted by any university.

upload.title: Upload Document
upload.description: You send us documents online by submitting an application (PDF/photo) — no need to bring originals in person

clarify.title: We Clarify Details
clarify.description: Our manager will contact you to clarify requirements

translate.title: Translate and Certify
translate.description: Licensed translators perform translation with notarial certification

receive.title: Receive Ready File
receive.description: We send completed translations in digital format or paper copy, by courier throughout Turkey if needed

accredited.title: Only accredited translators work
accredited.description: All our specialists have official yeminli tercüman accreditation with document certification rights

accepted.title: Translations accepted by all Turkish government institutions
accepted.description: Our translations are guaranteed to be accepted by universities, immigration services and other government agencies

online.title: Online translation without office visit
online.description: The entire process can be done remotely — send scans, receive ready translations

verification.title: Verification and correction before certification
verification.description: We carefully check each translation for compliance with Turkish institution requirements

rush.title: Rush translations — within a few hours
rush.description: If you need it quickly, we do translation and certification within 2-3 hours
